DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to develop and validate a predictive model of clinical outcomes based on the results of web-based self-reporting symptom diary for Crohn's disease.
DOC.brief_title: Predictive Model of Clinical Outcomes Using Web-based Self-reporting Symptom Diary for Crohn's Disease
DOC.criteria: Newly diagnosed of Crohn's disease within 6 months Must record their symptom in a webbased symptom diary at least 4 consecutive times for 2 months. Not able to use smart phone.
